marketing.paragraph: We are the platform that connects authentic travelers with unique adventures

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.sectionDescription: Three steps. Zero stress. More discovery.

steps.title: Plan
steps.description: Choose dates, origin city, duration and budget. Add filters and mood if you like.

steps.title: Get the surprise
steps.description: Receive your surprise trip. Just open the envelope and discover the destination.

steps.title: Travel stress-free
steps.description: Pack your bags. Flights and accommodation ready: human support when you need it.

cards.title: BY TRAVELLER
description: Discover authentic experiences created by real travelers.
